publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8080 Gil Paterson on behalf of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee: Financial Resolutions and Scrutiny of Revised Financial Memoranda—That the Parliament notes the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee’s 1st Report 2011 (Session 3), Financial Resolutions and scrutiny of revised Financial Memoranda (SP Paper 565), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 1 April 2011.
